titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2560) to cut, cap, and balance the Federal budget.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-150, by Mr. Woodall.
The resolution waives all points of order against consideration of the bill.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 53.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 355.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 235 - 175 (Roll no. 603).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 177 (Roll no. 604).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/18/2011--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2560) to cut, cap, and balance the Federal budget.
